_metadata.description: Quality Threshold Configurations for All Calibration Layers
_metadata.rationale: Centralized quality band definitions for consistent interpretation across layers

base_layer_quality.description: Quality bands for intrinsic method quality (@b layer scores)

excellent.interpretation: Superior theoretical foundation, implementation, and deployment maturity

good.interpretation: Solid quality across all three base components

acceptable.interpretation: Meets minimum standards but has improvement areas

final_calibration_quality.description: Quality bands for final aggregated calibration scores

excellent.interpretation: Method performs exceptionally well across all evaluated layers

good.interpretation: Method meets expectations across most layers

acceptable.interpretation: Method is usable but has notable limitations

insufficient.interpretation: Method quality is below acceptable threshold

role_specific_validation_thresholds.description: Minimum calibration scores required for each method role to be considered valid

analyzer.rationale: Analyzers must have strong base quality and contextual fit

processor.rationale: Processors focus on transformation quality and chain integrity

ingest.rationale: Ingestion can tolerate lower scores if structurally sound

utility.rationale: Utility methods have minimal quality requirements

validator.rationale: Validators must have high precision and reliability

aggregator.rationale: Aggregators require strong congruence and chain integrity

executor.rationale: Executors orchestrate full pipelines - require all 8 layers

executor_specific_thresholds.description: Per-executor validation thresholds (some domains have stricter requirements)

default_executor_threshold.rationale: Default threshold for executors not explicitly configured

meta_layer_performance_thresholds.description: Runtime and memory thresholds for @m layer cost evaluation

anti_universality_threshold.description: Maximum average compatibility across Q/D/P contexts
anti_universality_threshold.rationale: No method can have avg(Q_f, D_f, P_f) > 0.9 - prevents universal methods
